name: Faroz: The Beginning
description:
Faroz: The Beginning

Faroz is a young new recruit for the military that is tasked to save the world and kill all enemies... the main problem: he is scared to death to do it and his hands shake constantly!

Try to aim and kill as much enemies as you can before you run out of time!

Tips: 

  • there may be hidden items on some plants!

Controls:

  • WASD: move the player
  • Mouse to Aim and Left Click to shoot and place objects
